channel.title: 1.7.0.0 on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 1.7.0.0 on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 RC3: Getting there!
item.description: We’re getting closer! With this new Release Candidate, we deliver a strong RC, which is closer than ever to our quality objectives.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 RC2: On the Right Track
item.description: Another step in the right direction towards a stable v1.7, this RC2 fixes a lot of stuff and enhances some more.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 RC1: The Real Deal
item.description: Here it comes: the bug fixin’, performance improvin’, stabilizin, all singin’ all dancin’ RC1 for PrestaShop 1.7! It is packed with goodness, and needs your love!

item.title: Recommended for testing: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 RC0
item.description: Have you been waiting for a “stable enough” version of PrestaShop 1.7 in order to start truly testing this new major release? Well, consider yourself in luck, because today we are releasing the RC0 of PrestaShop – not quite a first RC, but close enough for you to start testing and provide us with the necessary feedback to make 1.7 a good fit for your needs!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 Beta 3 is out!
item.description: Hot on the heels of Beta 2, here’s PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 Beta 3, ready for you to test and give feedback about!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 reaches Beta 2 stage
item.description: We are happy to announce that PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 is now available for testing in its 2nd Beta version. More than ever, we need YOUR feedback as a merchant, a service provider, a module developer or a theme designer.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 Beta 1 is open for feedback!
item.description: The first Beta version for PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: Here comes PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 4!
item.description: Three weeks ago we released PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 3. Since then, and with the help of the community, we’ve been working on it to fix the bugs you’ve reported and to keep improving this new version. We’re now releasing PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 4 version, so we can keep gathering feedback and make sure that the final and stable version will be the best it can be!

item.title: Test PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 alpha 3 now!
item.description: Here it is. After two internal alpha versions, we’re happy to present to you this public alpha release of PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 – the first in a series of public alpha/beta/RC versions that we intend to release over several weeks, in order to gather feedback and make sure that the final and stable version is the best it can be!
